name: OWLMetrics
body:
### The OWL Metrics Project
OWLMetrics is a JAVA project for generating metrics for ontologies. It has been implemented using the [OWL API](http://owlapi.sourceforge.net/). In particular, it extends the package OWLMetrics from the OWLAPI. 

### Documentation 
A description of the implemented metrics and their usage is described in the published paper:
* E. Mikroyannidi, R. Stevens, and A. Rector. _Identifying ontology design styles with metrics._ In 7th International Workshop on Semantic Web Enabled Software Engineering (SWESE), 10th International Semantic Web Conference (ISWC) 2011.[\[PDF\]](http://iswc2011.semanticweb.org/fileadmin/iswc/Papers/Workshops/SWESE/5.pdf)

### Authors and Contributors
The contributor of this project is [Eleni Mikroyannidi](http://www.cs.man.ac.uk/~mikroyae/) 

### Support or Contact
If you have any problem or query or suggestion feel free to contact me in mikrohelen AT gmail.com.
